trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to individual, selectable child controls of containers that implement <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider" />.
Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.

If the result of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A> is that a single item is selected, then send an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> for that element; otherwise send an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent> as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫的結果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A>的單一項目已選取，則傳送<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent>該項目; 否則傳送<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent>依適當情況。

trans-unit.source: This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection.
trans-unit.target: 此規則不依存容器是否允許單一或多個選取項目，或在哪一個方法用來變更選取項目。

trans-unit.source: Only the result matters.
The following example code adds the item to a collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例程式碼會將項目加入至選取的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.
<see langword="true" /> if the element is selected; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果已選取的項目。，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example code returns `true` if this item is in the collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會傳回`true`此項目是否在選取項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.
Send an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent> as appropriate.
This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection.
trans-unit.target: 此規則不依存容器是否允許單一或多個選取項目，或在哪一個方法用來變更選取項目。

trans-unit.source: Only the result matters.
The following example code removes the item from a collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會移除選取的項目集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Deselects any selected items and then selects the current element.
The following example code clears all items from the collection of selected items and then adds this one.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例程式碼清除選取項目的集合中的所有項目，然後加入此項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the UI Automation provider that implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider" /> and acts as the container for the calling object.
The provider that supports <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider" />.
The following example code returns the UI Automation provider for the list box that contains this list item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會傳回包含此清單項目清單方塊的使用者介面自動化提供者。
